The .html entry form functions as a ship with goods (data), which enters a dock (AWS entry point) in a larger port (lamda). These goods then move into buisnesses (tables) within the surrounding city (database).

Shoppers (users) can access these stores, and pull goods off the shelf to take home (download on their local computer). They can then use those goods to generate food (figures, tables, and other project outputs).
